message.body: So close to being home!
I call you in like 30 mins? That okay?
Hope youre all settled in happily! Im at a gathering of gtown / gwash folk. Can i call ya around 9?? Hope you had a good day, my love.
Okie dokie!!!! Have fun and be safe!!!
Will do! :)
I watched that damned commercial again. And once again I teared up.
Sorry, my love! Just barely caught the train! Good luck on the test! Call you in a bit
It's okie dokie!!!! I'll talk to you soon!
....my sister wore my boots out with Gia. Gia threw up on her...and on my shoes. My mom threw them up :( I really liked those boots too.
Wow...thats not cool. Im sorry baby. These werent the new boots were they?? Cause then...for real, Gia owes you
They weren't new, but they were ones that I wore a lot. Crystal said she'd buy me another pair, but I don't know if I'll be able to find them.
Im sorry :-( Thats really not ok. Hope you can find them again.
I just looked. All sold out and none sold anywhere else :( I guess I'll have to find another.
:-/ definitely get another pair tho. Cause thats not fair

Seriously! How awful! My mom is freaking out cause she came home "drunk" and my mom said she stunk! She had vomit in her hair, jacket, purse, and shoes. Mom is also freaking out cause there's a police complaint/incident report in my sisters purse. Lord knows what she's been doing.
i@xr @Jeeesus. What the hell. Sure its nothing and that stink...gonna blame it on gia for now. But damn what was the occasion. Its not even late enough to come
i@xr !@ home that ripped

I know! I don't know what she was doing. My mom is probably having a mini crisis in her head. I don't think it's anything either...probably because she threw up outside vs. inside. It's annoying though because she's so out of it that she didn't want to take a shower...I smell her! Haha. She's gonna be pretty hung over tomorrow from the sounds of it.
Haha shes gonna hate herself when she wakes up stanking haha. Thatll teach her. Sheets, clothes, erythang
Seriously!!! Making me glad I don't like alcohol too much.
Hehe ditto
:D I love you baby!! I'm going to go to bed now! I love you so much!
Love you too!! Sleep well, darling :) Youre the best and i cant wait to talk to you tomorrow
Ditto!!
